text: Óscar Pereiro is a cyclist from Spain. He was born on 3 August 1977. He came second in the 2006 Tour de France. On 20 September 2007 he was declared the winner because Floyd Landis was found guilty of doping. ==Related pages== * List of Tour de France winners * Tour de France Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Doping cases in cycling Category:Spanish cyclists
title: Óscar Pereiro
